thread.title: Intelligence I-G Davidson Devasirvatham shifted out
thread.title_full: Intelligence I-G Davidson Devasirvatham shifted out

author: Internet Desk
title: Intelligence I-G Davidson Devasirvatham shifted out
text:
February 23, 2017 12:24 IST Updated: February 23, 2017 12:25 IST more-in Only a week ago, he replaced K.N. Sathiyamoorthy, who proceeded on leave. 
S. Davidson Devasirvatham, IPS, has been removed from the post of Inspector-General of Police, Intelligence, Chennai. 
According to a Home Department press release, Mr. Davidson is transferred and posted as IGP (Welfare) Chennai in the existing vacancy. 
His transfer of the 1995-batch IPS officer assumes signifance as he was was posted as Inspector-General of Police (IGP), Intelligence hardly a week ago. 
Mr. Davidson had earlier served as the Chief of Intelligence for a few months in 2015.
